text:
At a glance, everything looks important.  

Yet, an Essentialist explains a different logic.  

In reality, only a few things have exceptional value.  

Most everything else is far less important.  

The problem with being sleep-deprived is serious.  

It compromises our ability to tell the difference.  

It also affects our precious ability to prioritize.  

Sleep will enhance your ability to explore.  

It helps you make connections and do less.  

You will do better throughout your waking hours.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Sleep is essential for enhancing our ability to prioritize and focus on what truly matters.
